snippet: The trainer Doug O’Neill, who guided I’ll Have Another to a win in the 2012 Kentucky Derby, has been suspended for 135 days and placed on 18 months of probation by the California Horse Racing Board for violating a 2012 decision by the board.
abstract: California Horse Racing Board suspends trainer Doug O'Neill for 135 days and places him on 18 months of probation for violating 2012 decision by board.
lead_paragraph: The trainer Doug O’Neill, who guided I’ll Have Another to a win in the 2012 Kentucky Derby, has been suspended for 135 days and placed on 18 months of probation by the California Horse Racing Board for violating a 2012 decision by the board.
